song_name: All I Do Is Dream of You
lyrics:
5 contributorsall i do is dream of you lyricsall i do is dream of you the whole night through
with the dawn i still go on dreaming of you
youre every thought youre everything youre every song i ever sing
summer winter scat and spring

chorus
and were there more than 24 hours in a day
thatd be spent in sweet content just dreaming away
when skies are grey when skies are blue
morning noon and nighttime too
all i do the whole day through is dream of you

instrumental break

bridge
when skies are grey even when theyre blue

chorus
and were there more than 24 hours in a day
oh thatd be spent in sweet content dreaming away
when skies are grey when skies are blue
in the morning nighttime too
all i do the whole day through is dream im dreaming dreaming a dream of just dreaming dreaming a little dream youyou might also likeembed
